function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of various sources for heat and cold production may increase the risk of cross-contamination and the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases within the built environment leading to health risks for occupants.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, regular cleaning, and maintenance of HVAC systems to minimize the risk of cross-contamination.","Technologies":"UV germicidal sources, advanced air filtration systems, and smart HVAC control systems to monitor and maintain indoor air quality.","People":"Occupants of the built environment.","Owner":"Building operators, facility managers, and HVAC maintenance teams."},{"Description":"Humidification of air using water vapor may create an environment conducive to the growth and spread of airborne pathogens.","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne diseases due to the presence of moisture and potential microbial growth in the HVAC system.","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and control of indoor humidity levels, use of hygienic humidification systems, and maintenance of air handling units to prevent microbial growth.","Technologies":"Hygienic humidification systems, humidity sensors, and air quality monitoring devices.","People":"Occupants of the built environment.","Owner":"Building operators, facility managers, and HVAC maintenance teams."}]}
